mapper.select:
select
from william_goods where william_goods.id in (select goods_id from william_recommend_goods where status = 1 and tenant_id = #{tenantId} and client = #{client} ) order by william_goods.id desc
mapper.update: update william_goods set favorite = favorite + 1 where id = #{value}
update william_goods set favorite = favorite - 1 where id = #{value}
